---
category: news
title: "Author G Rajashekhar, a voice against communalism, dies at 75"
excerpt: "Progressive writer, intellectual and human rights activist from Udupi, G Rajashekhar, passed away at the age of 76 in Bengaluru on Wednesday, July 20. He had been battling a rare neurological condition called Progressive Supra-Nuclear Palsy (PSP or Atypical Parkinson's) for the past three years."
